SAINT.Name: Holy Wonderworkers and Unmercenary Martyrs Cyrus and John, and together with them the Martyr Athanasia and her daughters: Theodotia, Theoctista and Eudoxia at Canopus in Egypt (+311)

Venerable Nikita, of the Caves of Kiev, Hermit and Bishop of Novgorod (+1108)
Sts Anargyres Cyr et Jean, Stes Athanasie, Théodote, Théoctiste et Eudoxie
Sts Victorin, Victor, Nicéphore, Claude, Diodore, Sérapion et Papias
St Nicétas des Grottes de Kiev, Evêque de Novgorod
St Pachôme, Fondateur du Monastère de Kiensk
Бессребреников мчч. Кира и Иоанна и с ними мцц. Афанасии и дщерей ее Феодотии, Феоктисты и Евдоксии (311)
